actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, read twice, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution appointing a committee to notify the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the session.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of a committee of two Senators to join a similar committee of Representatives to notify the President that the two Houses are ready to adjourn.

titles.title: A resolution appointing a committee to notify the President concerning the proposed adjournment of the session.
